title: How to submit my podcast to Spotify - Quora

response.answer_text: Be sure you know your audio host. Many of them have one-click distribution that includes Spotify. I know the free host Anchor - The easiest way to make a podcast does, and Libsyn does as well. I’ll include a full list below. One of the requirements to get your podcast on Spotify is to have 2 months worth of shows published. Spotify can be a tough nut to crack. If you are hosted with one of the following audio hosts, you can get on Spotify through your host: ● Audioboom ● Blubbry ● Buzzsprout ● Fireside ● LibSyn ● Pippa ● PodBean ● Podigee ● Podomatic ● Simplecast ● Spreaker If you’re not hosted with one of these platforms, try this form - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfKJ76t_tPV2jugdX14NeajSfp7EV0hcgjVki1GEGuoeyJvDw/viewform?c=0&w=1 Spotify doesn’t guarantee acceptance. Good luck. I got this information from a PDF report that tells you how to get your podcast on all the major platforms as well as a few minor ones. There’s like more than 25 included with screenshots and detailed instructions. Here’s the report - Podcast Everywhere

Spotify: It’s possible, but you have to be patient - and it’s not guaranteed Before we get too far into this, you need to know there’s a catch. OK, it’s not quite a catch, it’s more of a caveat. Unlike the other directories or services, the powers-that-be at Spotify make it clear right up front that you can submit your show to them, but that your submission doesn’t guarantee that your show will indeed be chosen for inclusion in Spotify. So there’s that. But I think it’s worth a try anyway. Here’s how to do it. Go to this weblink: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfKJ76t_tPV2jugdX14NeajSfp7EV0hcgjVki1GEGuoeyJvDw/viewform It’s a Google form. Interesting, I don’t recall another submission process being done with a Google form. And you’ll notice right away that Spotify is making it clear that your submission may or may not be included in their directory of shows. The cool thing about this submission process is that you can submit more than one podcast at the same time. So rather than go through every form I’m just going to tell you that it’s fairly simple to do and it’s definitely worth your time. Should the Spotify authorities deem your podcast worthy enough for inclusion, your show would be exposed to all kinds of potential new listeners. This is one small part of an episode I published about ALL the places to submit your podcast: Podcastification -podcasting tips, podcast tricks, and how to podcast better: The 2017-2018 List of Podcast Directories Your Podcast MUST Be Listed In [Ep 79]
